column2: Vinny, 55-64 Male  on Treatment for 5 to less than 10 years (Patient)
column9: Tagamet is also used by people on Methadone.It blocks the liver from releasing too much Methadone at a time.I get a much better "Dose" by using it 1/2 hour before/after the dose. As for the price, buy it in Wal-Mart. It says "Cimetidine" on the box, 60 tablets for $4.88 ( 07/15/2011 ) There is one thing: If you start taking it, you must continue, or your dose will not work.

column9: This  drug seems to relieve GERD symptoms almost as well as my expensive,  Dr. prescribed Nexuim. With the Tagamet, I get occasional heartburn and reflux, but more often than not, my symptoms happen when I over eat. If I behave with my eating, this drug works fairly well.
